skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Expertise in building responsive and interactive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and other modern frameworks.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Skilled in server-side development with PHP, Node.js, and MySQL, focusing on building scalable and secure APIs and services.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Designing intuitive user interfaces and enhancing user experience through wireframes, prototypes, and user-centered design principles.

skills.title: Software Development
skills.description: Proficient in designing, developing, and maintaining software applications using modern programming languages, development tools, and best practices.

portfolio.title: Ahuse
portfolio.description: A real estate platform designed to simplify property searching with modern UI, responsive layout, and dynamic property listings.

portfolio.title: App Dashboard
portfolio.description: A responsive admin dashboard featuring data visualization, user management, and activity tracking using React and Chart.js.

portfolio.title: Easy Rentn
portfolio.description: A rental management app built to streamline the process of booking, listing, and managing rental properties efficiently.

testimonial.description: Working with this developer was seamless. They delivered clean code, timely updates, and exceeded expectations.
Outstanding professionalism and dedication. The project was completed ahead of schedule and worked flawlessly.
Incredible attention to detail and design. The final product truly reflected our brand vision and user needs.
